div.p: DevConf 2014 in Moscow, Russia on Jun 14
DevConf is the ultimate meeting place for russian-speaking web-developers, combining several language-specific conferences under one roof.
This year DevConf will include the following sections:

Each section will feature several talks from the active contributors/authors of the language. Among the invited speakers are Dmitry Stogov (Zend), Shawn McCool (Laravel), Dmitry Vyukov (Google), Sveta Smirnova (Oracle), Andrey Aksyonov (Sphinx), Anatoly Panov (Badoo) and many others, see more details on the official website.
